928130.name: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
928130.description:
Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts

A roguelike adventure in a world of dungeons, filled with dangerous monsters. Your Main quest is to find the Seven Magic Artifacts.
You have to fight against spiders, undead, dead, goblins, orcs, and many other.
Every Game is different, with randomized Levels, enemies, three different characters and over 130 Unique Items to find.
Can you find all the seven artifacts ?

Game Features:

- generates every time you play an unique labyrinth full of items and monsters
- four different level layouts
- masses of monsters
- magic spells
- different bosses
- roguelike style game
- permadeath or softcore mode chooseable in game options
- three different character classes – the orc, the undead and the human
- replaybility
928130.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 韩语, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
